_sText: Dimensions look best at 8d x 134w x 126h. This prefab was built using existing textures, no custom textures, I wanted to make it so anybody could add it to any map without having to force players to download excessive crap (i hate those servers that I spend 20 minutes download retarted mp3's and such just so I can join a game). Anybody can feel free to tweak it, re-texture it, whatever, just please dont claim the initial work as your own :) Also I took 8 screenshots, unfortunately it only lets me upload one. So I've hosted one here, and the remaining 7 at my site. Here are the remaining screenshots: http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_1.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_2.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_3.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_4.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_6.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_7.jpg http://jmcivor.com/marioprefab_pixelated_8.jpg My site! Sprays, Maps, Etc.
